📰 Tech News: OpenAI’s most capable AI model, GPT-5, may be coming in August

Key insights:

• The model will feature both conventional LLM and simulated reasoning.

📰 Tech News: Meta's wristband breakthrough lets you use digital devices without touching them

Key insights:
